Package imusim :: Package trajectories :: Module offset :: Class OffsetTrajectory

Class OffsetTrajectory

source code

Trajectory at an offset from another trajectory.

Method Details

__init__(self, parent, positionOffset=None, rotationOffset=None)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise trajectory.

Parameters:
  • parent - the AbstractTrajectory which this trajectory follows.
  • positionOffset - the offset vector from the parent trajectory in the co-ordinate frame of the parent. (3x1 np.ndarray)
  • rotationOffset - the rotational offset from the parent trajectory (Quaternion)
Overrides: object.__init__

acceleration(obj, t)

source code 

Return acceleration in the global frame at time t.

Parameters:
  • t - the time at which to evaluate the acceleration
Returns:
the acceleration vector at time t

Uses the algorithm from Young et al. 2010 'Distributed Estimation of Linear Acceleration for Improved Accuracy in Wireless Inertial Motion Capture' to calculate linear acceleration from rotational velocity and acceleration

Decorators:
  • @CacheLastValue()
  • @prepend_method_doc(PositionTrajectory)
Overrides: base.PositionTrajectory.acceleration
